axiom df-algext(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(calgext, copab(s0, s1, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfldext, cv(s1)), wral(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wrex(s3, cfv(cpl1, cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(cfv(ce1, cv(s3)), cv(s2)), cfv(c0g, cv(s0))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: brfldext
blocks.content: The field extension relation explicited. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 29-Jul-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm brfldext(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(c1, cfield)), wb(wbr(c0, cfldext, c1), wa(wceq(c1, co(c0, cress, cfv(cbs, c1))), wcel(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(csubrg, c0)))))
} = {
  bianabs(wa(wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(c1, cfield)), wbr(c0, cfldext, c1), wa(wceq(c1, co(c0, cress, cfv(cbs, c1))), wcel(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(csubrg, c0))))
  brabga(hs0, hs1, c0, cfield, c1, cfield, cfldext, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(c1, cfield)), wa(wceq(c1, co(c0, cress, cfv(cbs, c1))), wcel(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(csubrg, c0)))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfield), wcel(cv(hs1), cfield)), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), co(cv(hs0), cress, cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(csubrg, cv(hs0))))))
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfield), wcel(cv(hs1), cfield)), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), co(cv(hs0), cress, cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(csubrg, cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(c1, cfield)), wa(wceq(c1, co(c0, cress, cfv(cbs, c1))), wcel(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(csubrg, c0))))
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfield), wcel(cv(hs1), cfield), wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(c1, cfield))
  eleq1d(cv(hs0), cfield, c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  eleq1d(cv(hs1), cfield, c1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs1), co(cv(hs0), cress, cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(csubrg, cv(hs0))), wceq(c1, co(c0, cress, cfv(cbs, c1))), wcel(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(csubrg, c0)))
  eqeq12d(cv(hs1), co(cv(hs0), cress, cfv(cbs, cv(hs1))), c1, co(c0, cress, cfv(cbs, c1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  oveq12d(cv(hs0), cress, cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), c0, cfv(cbs, c1), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  eleq12d(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(csubrg, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(csubrg, c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  fveq2d(cbs, cv(hs1), c1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  simpr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  fveq2d(csubrg, cv(hs0), c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  simpl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  df-fldext(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(c1, cfield)), wa(wceq(c1, co(c0, cress, cfv(cbs, c1))), wcel(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(csubrg, c0)))))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(c1, cfield)), wa(wceq(c1, co(c0, cress, cfv(cbs, c1))), wcel(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(csubrg, c0)))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm brfldext(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Field ‚àß c1 ‚àà Field)‚Üí(c0[/FldExt]c1 ‚Üî(c1 =(c0[|`s](Base ` c1))‚àß(Base ` c1)‚àà(SubRing ` c0))))
} = {
  bianabs((c0 ‚àà Field ‚àß c1 ‚àà Field), c0[/FldExt]c1, (c1 =(c0[|`s](Base ` c1))‚àß(Base ` c1)‚àà(SubRing ` c0)))
  brabga(hs0, hs1, c0, cfield, c1, cfield, cfldext, ((c0 ‚àà Field ‚àß c1 ‚àà Field)‚àß(c1 =(c0[|`s](Base ` c1))‚àß(Base ` c1)‚àà(SubRing ` c0))), ((hs0 ‚àà Field ‚àß hs1 ‚àà Field)‚àß(hs1 =(hs0[|`s](Base ` hs1))‚àß(Base ` hs1)‚àà(SubRing ` hs0))))
  anbi12d((hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1), (hs0 ‚àà Field ‚àß hs1 ‚àà Field), (hs1 =(hs0[|`s](Base ` hs1))‚àß(Base ` hs1)‚àà(SubRing ` hs0)), (c0 ‚àà Field ‚àß c1 ‚àà Field), (c1 =(c0[|`s](Base ` c1))‚àß(Base ` c1)‚àà(SubRing ` c0)))
  anbi12d((hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1), hs0 ‚àà Field, hs1 ‚àà Field, c0 ‚àà Field, c1 ‚àà Field)
  eleq1d(hs0, cfield, c0, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1))
  eleq1d(hs1, cfield, c1, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1))
  anbi12d((hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1), hs1 =(hs0[|`s](Base ` hs1)), (Base ` hs1)‚àà(SubRing ` hs0), c1 =(c0[|`s](Base ` c1)), (Base ` c1)‚àà(SubRing ` c0))
  eqeq12d(hs1, (hs0[|`s](Base ` hs1)), c1, (c0[|`s](Base ` c1)), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1))
  oveq12d(hs0, cress, (Base ` hs1), c0, (Base ` c1), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1))
  eleq12d((Base ` hs1), (SubRing ` hs0), (Base ` c1), (SubRing ` c0), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1))
  fveq2d(cbs, hs1, c1, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1))
  simpr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  fveq2d(csubrg, hs0, c0, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1))
  simpl(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  df-fldext(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 ‚àà Field ‚àß c1 ‚àà Field)‚àß(c1 =(c0[|`s](Base ` c1))‚àß(Base ` c1)‚àà(SubRing ` c0))))
  diff.hs1.w(((c0 ‚àà Field ‚àß c1 ‚àà Field)‚àß(c1 =(c0[|`s](Base ` c1))‚àß(Base ` c1)‚àà(SubRing ` c0))))
}

blocks.name: ccfldextrr
blocks.content: The field of the complex numbers is an extension of the field of the real numbers. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Jul-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm ccfldextrr() {
  |- wbr(ccnfld, cfldext, crefld)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wbr(ccnfld, cfldext, crefld), wceq(crefld, co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, crefld))), wcel(cfv(cbs, crefld), cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  eqtri(crefld, co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, crefld)), co(ccnfld, cress, cr))
  df-refld()
  oveq2i(ccnfld, cress, cr, cfv(cbs, crefld))
  eqeltrri(cfv(cbs, crefld), cfv(csubrg, ccnfld), cr)
  rebase()
  simpli(wcel(cr, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(crefld, cdr))
  resubdrg()
  mp2an(wb(wbr(ccnfld, cfldext, crefld), wa(wceq(crefld, co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, crefld))), wcel(cfv(cbs, crefld), cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))), wcel(ccnfld, cfield), wcel(crefld, cfield))
  mpbir2an(wcel(ccnfld, cfield), wcel(ccnfld, cdr), wcel(ccnfld, ccrg))
  cndrng()
  cncrng()
  isfld(ccnfld)
  refld()
  brfldext(ccnfld, crefld)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ccfldextrr() {
  ‚ä¢ CCfld[/FldExt]RRfld
} = {
  mpbir2an(CCfld[/FldExt]RRfld, RRfld =(CCfld[|`s](Base ` RRfld)), (Base ` RRfld)‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))
  eqtri(crefld, (CCfld[|`s](Base ` RRfld)), (CCfld[|`s]‚Ñù))
  df-refld()
  oveq2i(ccnfld, cress, cr, (Base ` RRfld))
  eqeltrri((Base ` RRfld), (SubRing ` CCfld), cr)
  rebase()
  simpli(‚Ñù ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld), RRfld ‚àà DivRing)
  resubdrg()
  mp2an((CCfld[/FldExt]RRfld ‚Üî(RRfld =(CCfld[|`s](Base ` RRfld))‚àß(Base ` RRfld)‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))), CCfld ‚àà Field, RRfld ‚àà Field)
  mpbir2an(CCfld ‚àà Field, CCfld ‚àà DivRing, CCfld ‚àà CRing)
  cndrng()
  cncrng()
  isfld(ccnfld)
  refld()
  brfldext(ccnfld, crefld)
}

blocks.name: fldextfld1
blocks.content: A field extension is only defined if the extension is a field. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 29-Jul-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm fldextfld1(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, cfldext, c1), wcel(c0, cfield))
} = {
  syl(wbr(c0, cfldext, c1), wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cfield, cfield)))
  sseldi(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cfield, cfield), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfield), wcel(cv(hs1), cfield)), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), co(cv(hs0), cress, cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(csubrg, cv(hs0)))))), wbr(c0, cfldext, c1))
  opabssxp(hs0, hs1, cfield, cfield, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), co(cv(hs0), cress, cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(csubrg, cv(hs0)))))
  syl6eleq(cop(c0, c1), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfield), wcel(cv(hs1), cfield)), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), co(cv(hs0), cress, cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(csubrg, cv(hs0)))))), cfldext, wbr(c0, cfldext, c1))
  biimpi(wbr(c0, cfldext, c1), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cfldext))
  df-br(c0, cfldext, c1)
  df-fldext(hs0, hs1)
  opelxp1(c0, c1, cfield, cfield)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfield)
  diff.hs1.c(cfield)
}

  df-fldext(hs0, hs1)

  eleq1d(co(cv(hs0), cextdg, cv(hs1)), cn0, co(c0, cextdg, c1), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  oveq12(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1), c1, cextdg)

blocks.content: Value of the field extension degree operation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 29-Jul-2023.)

thm fldexttr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  simpld(wa(wbr(c0, cfldext, c1), wbr(c1, cfldext, c2)), wceq(c2, co(c1, cress, cfv(cbs, c2))), wcel(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(csubrg, c1)))
  syl6eq(co(c1, cress, cfv(cbs, c2)), co(c0, cress, cin(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2))), co(co(c0, cress, cfv(cbs, c1)), cress, cfv(cbs, c2)), wa(wbr(c0, cfldext, c1), wbr(c1, cfldext, c2)))
  oveq1d(c1, cress, cfv(cbs, c2), co(c0, cress, cfv(cbs, c1)), wa(wbr(c0, cfldext, c1), wbr(c1, cfldext, c2)))
  mp2an(wceq(co(co(c0, cress, cfv(cbs, c1)), cress, cfv(cbs, c2)), co(c0, cress, cin(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2)))), wcel(cfv(cbs, c1), universe), wcel(cfv(cbs, c2), universe))
  fvex(cbs, c1)
  fvex(cbs, c2)
  ressress(cfv(cbs, c1), universe, cfv(cbs, c2), universe, c0)
  oveq2d(c0, cress, cin(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2)), cfv(cbs, c2), wa(wbr(c0, cfldext, c1), wbr(c1, cfldext, c2)))
  syl5eqr(cin(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2)), cfv(cbs, c2), cin(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c1)), wa(wbr(c0, cfldext, c1), wbr(c1, cfldext, c2)))

  syl(wa(wbr(c0, cfldext, c1), wbr(c1, cfldext, c2)), wss(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(csubrg, c1)))

  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  df-ss(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c1))
  syl2anc(wa(wbr(c0, cfldext, c1), wbr(c1, cfldext, c2)), wcel(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(csubrg, c0)), wcel(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(csubrg, c0)), wcel(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(csubrg, co(c0, cress, cfv(cbs, c1)))))
  simprd(wa(wbr(c0, cfldext, c1), wbr(c1, cfldext, c2)), wcel(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(csubrg, c0)), wceq(c1, co(c0, cress, cfv(cbs, c1))))

blocks.name: extdgid
blocks.content: A trivial field extension has degree one. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Aug-2023.)

blocks.name: extdgmul
blocks.content: The multiplicativity formula for degrees of field extensions. Given ` E ` a field extension of ` F ` , itself a field extension of ` K ` , the degree of the extension ` E /FldExt K ` is the product of the degrees of the extensions ` E /FldExt F ` and ` F /FldExt K ` . Proposition 1.2 of [Lang], p. 224. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jul-2023.)
